root: ^Disturbing events at Lake Flynn are shaking our town of Revelations to its core.
^Seemingly overnight, the popular hang-out spot erupted with hundreds of dead fish. The water continues to turn a startling shade of blood red.
^The sudden sight has struck fear in our government, local businesses, and churches.
^Following the events at Lake Flynn, St. Lawrence Hospital has reported an increase in admissions to the ICU. Multiple people have reported stomach issues, fevers, and possible respiratory issues.
^Both St. Lawrence Hospital and the Mayor have not issued a statement.
^Rumors are circling that there is a connection between the surge of sick citizens and the dead fish.
^We will keep you posted, Revelations, as we learn more about the situation.
^In light of the situation, newcomer Icarus Industries has vowed to assist our town in any way possible.
^They have begun donations to our medical centers, assisting local businesses, and hiring environmental specialists to look into the issue.
^Icarus Industries has only recently moved into our quiet town and is already receiving good graces from everyo–
^Revelations. A strong name. A strong history. A strong community.
^Icarus Industries thanks you, Revelations, for welcoming us with open arms.
^Thank you for allowing us to become members of your wonderful family.
^As a result of your warm welcome, we are excited to announce that we have new job openings at our offices and facilities.
^Together, we will bring a strong future to Revelations-
^How does no one else see it?
^Gail, you don’t have to be so seri-
^If we fuck up, we will get arrested and we’ll never get the answers we need.
^You’re right. Sorry. I hear you loud and clear.
^Alright. As much as I would like to plan a lot further ahead, the news hasn’t been too hopeful.
^I’m outside the fence. There’s that hole that you mentioned.
^Good. Remember, we go one by one. Let’s try to keep it quiet. Keep us posted.
